resources.string:
ReGeX /ˈrɛːɡɛx/ is an android game, with a simple objective: Find a regular expression which does match certain strings, but doesn't match others.


Depending on how long the expression is, how many regex characters you used and a few more variables, your score is generated. From the number of game and your score (high score and less games), the current level is calculated. The higher the level, the more complex the challenges become. There is no last or final level - it just goes on forever.


Select game modes: either play random (fast and offline) or REDB [Regular Expression Database] (more challenging but online). Select and change modes in the settings


Below I have added a link to a cheat-sheet on regular expression, for those unfamiliar with the syntax. There are tons of books and other tutorials on the subject, just use your search engine of choice and make sure you're looking for perl regular expressions.
